summary: SummaryIsntree Ultra-Low Molecular Hyaluronic Acid Toner is a moisture-boosting toner that quenches skin’s thirst in 3 seconds, deeply delivering refreshing moisture with ultra-low molecular weight hyaluronic acid.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstant 3-Second Hydration: Quenches skin’s thirst in seconds, providing a boost of moisture.24-Hour Hydration Retention: Deeply hydrates the skin and locks in moisture throughout the day.Quick Absorption: Lightweight texture absorbs quickly, leaving no greasy residue.Fragrance-Free: No fragrance, perfect for sensitive skin.FeaturesUltra-Low-Molecular-Weight Hyaluronic Acid: With an average molecular size of 329 Da, this hyaluronic acid deeply penetrates the skin, targeting dryness and tightness for lasting hydration.14-Layer Hyaluronic Acid Complex: From ultra-low to high molecular of Hyaluronic acid help hydrate the inner and outer part of the skin.Low pH Toner: Formulated with a pH of 5.33 to maintain and support the skin’s natural barrier.Key Ingredients14 Types of Hyaluronic Acid: A unique blend of 14 types of hyaluronic acid that deeply hydrate, leaving skin moisturized, smooth, and revitalized for 24 hours.Sea Water from Ulleung Island: Packed with magnesium, calcium, and potassium, this mineral-rich seawater replenishes moisture, strengthens the skin’s defenses, and prevents dehydration.Aquaseal: Enhances moisture retention and strengthens the skin barrier.Witch Hazel Extract: Refines skin texture and promotes skin turnover.Cypress Leaf Extract: Soothes and calms the skin.Item 2636345How To UseWith a cotton pad pour an appropriate amount onto a cotton pad and gently wipe across the face to refine skin texture. With bare hands Apply additional layers as needed when skin feels dry, gently patting to allow deep hydration to absorb.IngredientsWater, Methylpropanediol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sea Water, Glycerin, Betaine, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Malachite Extract, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Xylitylglucoside, Anhydroxylitol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xylitol, Potassium Hyaluronate, Glucose, Dimethylisilanol Hyaluronate, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Calcium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Sodium Sulfated Hyaluronate, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Hyaluronate, Sodium Oleoyl Hyaluronate.
how_to_use: With a cotton pad pour an appropriate amount onto a cotton pad and gently wipe across the face to refine skin texture. With bare hands Apply additional layers as needed when skin feels dry, gently patting to allow deep hydration to absorb.
